Class TimeZoneConversions

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.TimeZoneConversions
  • public class TimeZoneConversions
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      TimeZoneConversions()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.time.LocalTime> getBusinessTimes​(int hours, int minutes, int numHoursOpen)
      generates a list of EST Business times converted to the user's zoned datetime Business time is 8 AM - 10 PM EST, including weekends (14 hours, divided into quarters = 56 hours) Not allowing a start time to be after 9:45 PM EST as 15 min is smallest appt time and business closes at 10 PM
      static java.time.LocalDateTime toRealLocalDateTime​(java.time.LocalDateTime datetime)
      converts a LocalDateTime object that is in UTC zone into a LocalDateTime object based on user's ZoneID
      static java.time.LocalDateTime toUTCTime​(java.time.LocalDateTime datetime)
      converts a user zoned LocalDateTime back into UTC time to be loaded into database

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • toRealLocalDateTime

        public static java.time.LocalDateTime toRealLocalDateTime​(java.time.LocalDateTime datetime)
        converts a LocalDateTime object that is in UTC zone into a LocalDateTime object based on user's ZoneID
        Parameters:
        datetime - the LocalDateTime object to convert to user's zone
        Returns:
        the LocalDateTime that has been converted into the user's timezone

      • toUTCTime

        public static java.time.LocalDateTime toUTCTime​(java.time.LocalDateTime datetime)
        converts a user zoned LocalDateTime back into UTC time to be loaded into database
        Parameters:
        datetime - is the user zoned LocalDateTime
        Returns:
        LocalDateTime of UTC zone

      • getBusinessTimes

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.time.LocalTime> getBusinessTimes​(int hours,
                                                                                      int minutes,
                                                                                      int numHoursOpen)
        generates a list of EST Business times converted to the user's zoned datetime Business time is 8 AM - 10 PM EST, including weekends (14 hours, divided into quarters = 56 hours) Not allowing a start time to be after 9:45 PM EST as 15 min is smallest appt time and business closes at 10 PM
        Returns:
        availableBusinessTimes
